articles.description: All the reaction & latest football news with Pep Guardiola set to stay on as Man City boss for at least one more year.
articles.title: Pep Guardiola: Man City manager extends contract - reaction

articles.description: Rafael Nadal retires from professional tennis after a 23-year career like no other. On a night of gratitude and grief, Spain led the world in saying "Gracias Rafa".
articles.title: Rafael Nadal retires: What the 22-time Grand Slam champion means to Spain

articles.description: As the Pep Guardiola contract news breaks, BBC Sport asks how does he compare to some other managerial legends?
articles.title: Pep Guardiola: How does Man City manager compare to other legendary bosses?

articles.description: BBC World Service's World Football has been uncovering the story behind the iconic photo of Brandi Chastain and the impact it had on women's football.
articles.title: Brandi Chastain: The story behind iconic photo of USA's World Cup win

articles.description: Lautaro Martinez moves level with Diego Maradona in the all-time Argentina scoring charts in a 1-0 World Cup qualifying win over Peru in Buenos Aires.
articles.title: Argentina 1-0 Peru: Lautaro Martinez equals Diego Maradona record in win

articles.description: Rafael Nadal says he would like to be remembered as "a kid who followed their dreams" as the tennis great says a poignant farewell to the sport.
articles.title: Rafael Nadal: Tennis great retires at Davis Cup, saying he was 'a kid who followed their dreams'

articles.description: Having drawn level with Brian O'Driscoll on 133 Ireland caps last weekend, Cian Healy's record-setting career has been one characterised by resilience.
articles.title: Ireland v Fiji: 'Unique' Cian Healy set for place in Irish rugby record books

articles.description: As the 'Trump dance' goes viral on TikTok, we look at which sportspeople are doing it - and why.
articles.title: What is the 'Trump dance'? And where have we seen it in sport?

articles.description: Liverpool midfielder Dominik Szoboszlai scores a Panenka penalty in the 99th minute of stoppage time as Hungary grab a late equaliser to deny Germany.
articles.title: Dominik Szoboszlai's late Panenka penalty for Hungary denies Germany in Nations League

articles.description: The Cleveland Cavaliers' 15-match winning run in the NBA comes to an end against the Boston Celtics.
articles.title: NBA Cup: Boston Celtics end Cleveland Cavaliers' 15-match winning run
